2020.SR.summary: SABIC Agri-Nutrients Company engages in the production, conversion, marketing, and trade of fertilizers in Saudi Arabia and internationally. The company offers urea; ammonia; and nitrogen-based inorganic products, including DAP, MAP, 2-ethyl hexanol, dioctyl phthalate, and other products. It serves industrial, agriculture, automotive, building and construction, consumer electrical and electronics, healthcare, industrial, mass transportation, packaging sectors. SABIC Agri-Nutrients Company was formerly known as Saudi Arabian Fertilizers Company. The company was incorporated in 1965 and is headquartered in Jubail, Saudi Arabia. SABIC Agri-Nutrients Company is a subsidiary of National Chemical Fertilizers Company.
